entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
